Eden UI

Build beautiful applications with Svelte 5 and Tailwind CSS
Get Started View Components

Why Eden UI?

100+ Components

Comprehensive component library covering buttons, forms, navigation, data display, feedback, and more.

Svelte 5 Native

Built from the ground up with Svelte 5 runes for optimal performance and developer experience.

20 Color Themes

Every component supports 20 color variants out of the box, with full dark mode support.

Type Safe

Full TypeScript support with automatic prop inference via tailwind-variants.

Accessible

WCAG 2.1 AA compliant with proper ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation.

Tree Shakeable

Only bundle what you use. Each component is independently importable.

Quick Install
